scripts.say: Ahhaha~ Sheâ€™s like a steel giant, so fragile while under torpedo attack. What a pity.
Our credit was stolen by the Army Air Corps, which was not expected. It seems we need to play smarter in the future.
Well, at this point, the sisters of the First, Second, and Fifth fleets should have started their attack on the other side of the ocean.
Hehehe, interesting, seems the world will soon become a livelier reality.
Wait and see. A new era is about to begin.
